alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Macomb; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lapeer, northern Macomb and central St. Clair Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Lexington to near Metamora. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Capac around 620 PM EDT. Armada and Emmett around 625 PM EDT. Richmond and Memphis around 630 PM EDT. Marysville around 645 PM EDT. St. Clair around 650 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Riley Center, Fort Gratiot, Allenton, Adair, Berville, Columbus, Rattle Run, Goodells, Smiths Creek and Wadhams. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
